name: Common
typicalSpeakers: Humans and widely used as a trade language across the realms
description: Spoken by humans and widely used as a trade language across the realms.

name: Common Sign Language
typicalSpeakers: Used alongside Common by those who cannot speak or hear
description: A gestural language used alongside Common, enabling communication without speech.

name: Draconic
typicalSpeakers: Dragons, dragonborn, and kobolds
description: One of the oldest languages, spoken by dragons, dragonborn, and kobolds.

name: Dwarvish
typicalSpeakers: Dwarves
description: Spoken by dwarves. Full of hard consonants and guttural sounds.

name: Elvish
typicalSpeakers: Elves
description: Spoken by elves. Fluid with subtle intonations and intricate grammar.

name: Giant
typicalSpeakers: Ogres, giants, and related creatures
description: Spoken by ogres, giants, and related creatures.

name: Gnomish
typicalSpeakers: Gnomes
description: Spoken by gnomes. Known for technical treatises and catalogs.

name: Goblin
typicalSpeakers: Goblinoids including goblins, hobgoblins, and bugbears
description: Spoken by goblinoids including goblins, hobgoblins, and bugbears.

name: Halfling
typicalSpeakers: Halflings
description: Spoken by halflings. Rarely written; oral tradition is strong.

name: Orc
typicalSpeakers: Orcs
description: Spoken by orcs. A harsh, grating language with no script of its own historically.

name: Abyssal
typicalSpeakers: Demons and chaotic evil outsiders of the Abyss
description: Spoken by demons and chaotic evil outsiders of the Abyss.

name: Celestial
typicalSpeakers: Celestials — angels, guardinals, and other good-aligned beings
description: Spoken by celestials — angels, guardinals, and other good-aligned beings.

name: Deep Speech
typicalSpeakers: Aberrations — mind flayers, beholders, and similar entities
description: Spoken by aberrations — mind flayers, beholders, and similar entities. No standard script.

name: Infernal
typicalSpeakers: Devils and lawful evil outsiders of the Nine Hells
description: Spoken by devils and lawful evil outsiders of the Nine Hells.

name: Primordial
typicalSpeakers: Elementals
description: Spoken by elementals. Includes dialects: Aquan, Auran, Ignan, and Terran. Creatures that know one dialect can communicate with those who know a different one.

name: Sylvan
typicalSpeakers: Fey creatures — dryads, satyrs, pixies, and treants
description: Spoken by fey creatures — dryads, satyrs, pixies, and treants.

name: Undercommon
typicalSpeakers: Denizens of the Underdark — drow, duergar, and deep gnomes
description: Spoken by denizens of the Underdark — drow, duergar, and deep gnomes.

name: Aquan
typicalSpeakers: Water elementals and creatures of the Plane of Water
description: A dialect of Primordial spoken by water elementals and creatures of the Plane of Water.

name: Auran
typicalSpeakers: Air elementals and creatures of the Plane of Air
description: A dialect of Primordial spoken by air elementals and creatures of the Plane of Air.

name: Ignan
typicalSpeakers: Fire elementals and creatures of the Plane of Fire
description: A dialect of Primordial spoken by fire elementals and creatures of the Plane of Fire.

name: Terran
typicalSpeakers: Earth elementals and creatures of the Plane of Earth
description: A dialect of Primordial spoken by earth elementals and creatures of the Plane of Earth.

name: Druidic
typicalSpeakers: Druids
description: A rare secret language known only to druids, granted by the class.

name: Thieves' Cant
typicalSpeakers: Rogues
description: A rare secret mix of jargon and coded messages known to rogues, granted by the class.
